name: a(n):= #G_{2n}(3n+1) for n >= 1, where G_{2n}(3n+1) is the set of all pure (2n)-sparse gapset of genus 3n+1 and n a positive integer.
link: Gilberto B. Almeida Filho and Matheus Bernardini On pure kappa-sparse gapsets, Semigroup Forum, Vol. 104 (2022), pp. 213-227.
Gilberto Brito and Stéfani Vieira, A certain sequence on pure kappa-sparse gapsets, arXiv:2407.21563 [math.CO], 2024. See pp. 1-2.
author: _Gilberto Brito de Almeida_, Jul 19 2024

name: Decimal expansion of (2 + gamma - log(Pi))/4.
link: Stephane Louboutin, Majorations explicites de |L(1, χ)| (Suite), C. R. Acad. Sci. Paris. 323, pp. 443-446 (1996). (In French). See Theorem 1 at p. 444.
author: _Stefano Spezia_, Jul 19 2024
